title: Can I be a forensic science technician when I just have a BS in forensic biology? What other jobs can I get with a BS of forensic biology - Quora

response.answer_text: Depending on where you received your BS in forensic biology you should not have to ask the questions you are asking. You need to look at these websites, Default or swafs.us. You are in a position to apply for a job in a forensic lab concentrating on DNA or similar area. Yes you can get a job as a forensic technician so apply at your local law enforcement area. Your best bet is to try and get an internship with a forensic crime laboratory. In the immediate future concentrate on improving your core courses in both Biology and Chemistry. You need to get out there and do some research.
